content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron-plate.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) used for smelting copper ore into copper-plate.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 10}, status NO_POWER, research topic automation, and electrical_id 26004.
- ElectricityGroup (id 26004) connecting small electric poles at positions (8.5, 6.5), (9.5, 6.5), and (10.5, 7.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(-10.5, 18.5) producing electricity; warnings include “not connected to power network”, “no input liquid”, and “no fluid present in connections”; connection points at (-10.5, 16.0) and (-10.5, 21.0); status NOT_CONNECTED.
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) used for heating water; warning “out of fuel”; contains a fluid box with water (amount ≈191.55, temperature 15); connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); utilizes fluid_system [131683] with steam output at (-7.5, 24.5); status NO_FUEL.
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water intake; status WORKING; connection point at (-9.5, 23.5); contains a fluid box with water (amount ≈99.37, temperature 15) using fluid_system [131683].
- Wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5) serving as the manual fuel feeding system.
- Pipeline Network consisting of:
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system 131683 at position(-5.5, 19.5), status WORKING.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system 131682 at position(-2.5, 19.5), status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system 131695 at position(5.5, 21.5), status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system 131694 at position(1.5, 23.5), status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system 131690 at position(-7.5, 25.5), status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system 131699 at position(0.5, 24.5), status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system 131698 at position(1.5, 25.5), status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system 131701 at position(1.5, 27.5), status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system 131702 at position(4.5, 27.5), status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system 131703 at position(-0.5, 28.5), status EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Repeated connection attempts using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system IDs [128363, 128447, 128529, 128613, 128695, 128779, 128861, 128945] failed.
  – Tip: Ensure connection attempts employ the currently active fluid_system identifiers present in the established pipeline network.
  
• Multiple connection attempts using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system IDs [129027, 129111, 129193, 129277, 129359, 129443, 129525, 129609, 129691, 129775, 129857, 129941, 130023, 130107, 130189, 130273] failed to locate any candidate pipe groups within a 15‐tile search radius near position(-5.5, 19.5).
  – Tip: Validate that the pipeline network is configured with the active fluid_system identifier and that candidate pipe groups lie within the effective search radius.
  
• Multiple connection attempts in steps 2568–2575 using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system IDs [130355, 130439, 130521, 130605, 130687, 130771, 130853, 130937] failed to locate a candidate group near position(-5.5, 19.5).
  – Tip: Verify that the fluid_system identifiers used in these connection attempts reflect the active pipeline configuration; reconfigure if necessary.
  
• Inconsistencies in fluid_system references among the boiler, offshore pump, and associated pipe groups resulted in connection failures.
  – Tip: Synchronize fluid_system assignments across all pipeline components to maintain uniformity.
  
• Multiple connection attempts using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system IDs [131019, 131103, 131185, 131269, 131351, 131435, 131517, 131601] failed to locate any candidate group within a 15‐tile radius near position(-5.5, 19.5).
  – Tip: Confirm that pipe group fluid_system identifiers are updated and correctly positioned within the designated search radius.
